column1: // IDLEPRONE - LDS: Need ADS for prone RPG
// WALK, WALKCR - LDS: Need Dual Wield, Hold Items
// FIREWEAPON - LDS: Sniper may need ADS for prone
// CROUCH_TO_STAND - LDS: Need Grenade, possible need RPG
// STAND_TO_CROUCH - LDS: Need Grenade, possibly need RPG
// KNIFE_MELEE, KNIFE_MELEE_CHARGE - LDS: Need a swipe and stab for prone and crouch
//                                        for Hold and Dual Wield weapons
// DROPWEAPON - LDS: May need a crouch putaway for Hold Items and RPG
// RAISEWEAPON - LDS: Need a crouch putaway for Hold Items and RPG
// JUMP, JUMPBK - LDS: Need runjumps for Hold Items and Dual Wield, need all jumps for RPG
// LAND - LDS: Need runjump_lands for Hold Items and Dual Wield, need all lands for RPG
// SHELLSHOCK - LDS: RPGs need custom prone shellshocks
// FLARED - LDS: We need Grenade anims. RPG needs custom prone animations
